categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Redbill was a Cargo ferry used by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War.

RedBill, along with its sister ship Wippet were to pick up Imperial munitions stolen by pirates as part of a trade agreement. However, Assault Gunboats followed by two stormtrooper transports arrived to reclaim the munitions. The Gunboats destroyed the pirate escort shuttles Devil and Y-wings disabled both Filcher and Riirdo and arrested the crews and destroyed both Redbill and Wippet. The event was recorded to train future pilots such as Maarek Stele.
